bill.summary:
Resources to Expand Partnerships for Opportunity and Workforce and Economic Revitalization Act or the RE-POWER Act
This bill provides FY2022 supplemental appropriations to carry out Appalachian Regional Commission grant programs. The bill designates the funding as emergency spending, which is exempt from discretionary spending limits.
